name: Control is an illusion
description:
English:

A game about Mr.Knob, a man who has to fight for control against a "something"

With 10 levels (currently) this game has been made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020 with the "Out Of Control" theme

Every resource used in it is under the creative commons license, including all the sprites made specifically for the project, so with nothing more to add Thanks for playing

Español:

Un juego acerca de Mr.Knob, un hombre que debe pelear contra "algo" para recuperar el control de su cuerpo

Con 10 niveles (actualmente) el juego fue hecho para participar en el GMTK Game Jam 2020 con el tema "Fuera de control"
